articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Laos Appointed
    Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Thae Jong was appointed as DPRK ambassador e. p. to the Lao People's Democratic Republic, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
